message: Mine is Old Dutch Dill Pickle potato chips, followed closely by plain Lay's. Just something about a good plain potato chip, no dip. What about you?
I'm being slightly obsessed with potato chips today. What's your favorite flavor and brand of potato chip? Yes, plain is a flavor.
Any dill pick flavor, Death Rain Habenero chips, and Cape Cod Sea Salt & Vinegar
Jalapeño potato chips. I really like Rachel's but they're impossible to find anymore.
Depends on the day, but usually Mrs Vick's jalapeño or Lay's bbq.
I'm currently enamored with the Kettle Cooked style chips like the 'Krunchers!" http://herbg.tumblr.com/post/1509282678/so-tasty
When I was growing up, it was Charles Chips.  They were delivered to your house in big metal containers.
Pringles orig flavor. I am actually a big fan of the generic Kroger wavy potato chips right now. Not too bad and they are way cheap
I tend to prefer kettle-cooked chips. Jalapeno..or sea salt and vinegar. Nom. Oh, and cracked pepper! Shoot, I love good potato chips..
Popsecret Onion, Jalapeno Kettle cooked also pretty good.
I got a hold of a bag of low salt BBQ Utz potato chips last week. I could not stop....the humanity!
Popchips sorry, Man my multitasking skills aren't what they used to...
